text: The 2018 PBA All-Star Week is the annual all-star week of the Philippine Basketball Association (PBA)'s 2017–18 season being held on May 23 to 27, 2018 on three different venues covering Luzon (Batangas), Visayas (Iloilo) and Mindanao (Davao). ==Mindanao leg== ===All-Star Game=== ====Roster==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+PBA Mindanao All-Stars |- !scope="col" Pos. !! style="width:150px;"|Player !! width=210px|Team !! Time |- |style="text-align:center"| F || Beau Belga || Rain or Shine Elasto Painters || align=center| 21.7s |- |style="text- align:center"| C | John Paul Erram || Blackwater Elite || align=center| 29.6s |- |style="text-align:center"| F | Gabby Espinas || San Miguel Beermen || align=center| 30.5s |- |} ===Three-Point Shootout=== This year's shootout featured a new format. Each of the five racks now has two moneyballs, with the first and fifth balls being valued as two points. This was a departure from the previous years' feature of having an "all-moneyball rack". This also increased the maximum possible points to 35 from 34. {| class="wikitable" |+Contestants ! Pos. !! style="width:150px;"|Player !! width=200px|Team !! Height !! Weight !! First round !! to a knee injury. * Ronald Tubid played in place of Joe Devance. * Carl Bryan Cruz was unable to participate. * Allein Maliksi was unable to participate due to an injury. =====Game===== *Jeff Chan was named as the game's MVP. ==Logo making contest== The league launched a logo-making contest for the All-Star week on February 23, 2018. The winner of the contest will win an all-expense-paid trip for two to one of the All-Star week legs (Davao, Batangas or Iloilo). PBA launches sketch the All-Star 2018 logo contest, PBA.ph, February 23, 2018 On March 15, an entry by John Paul Limos was selected as the winner of the contest by a selection committee composed of Commissioner Willie Marcial, PBA Press Corps president Gerry Ramos and Magnolia Hotshots team manager Alvin Patrimonio.LOOK: PBA 2018 All-Star Games logo, ABS-CBN Sports, March 15, 2018 The winning entry however got disqualified the following day since the logo had a very similar look from the logo used by PlayPark All-Stars (an e-sports tournament).Oops: PBA pulls out winning All-Star logo after similar design surfaces, ABS-CBN Sports, March 16, 2018 On March 19, a new logo, designed by Jerome Allan Moreno was selected as the winner of the logo making contest.PBA All Star 2018 logo has a retro touch, PBA.ph, March 19, 2018 ==See also== *2017–18 PBA season *Philippine Basketball Association *Philippine Basketball Association All-Star Weekend ==References== 2018 Category:2017–18 PBA season Category:Sports in Iloilo Category:Sports in Batangas Category:Sports in Davao del Sur Category:Philippines men's national basketball team games
